comments.html:
The biggest headache is the migration. Maintain a legacy production environment and design something new, whatever it may be, and wherever it may be, and not have it break, when you turn off the old and turn on the new.
The old invariably has STP and the new does not.
I've seen these as Groundhog projects as everything dies and the they start all over again, multiple times.
